website_summaries.verdict: This device simultaneously elevates the jawbone and supports the neck.
pros: Small device is easy to take with you on the go
Sold with simple-to-follow instructions to ensure you can start using the device right away
Inflatable device guarantees you can customize your comfort level
cons: Hook-and-loop fasteners tend to become loose
May be too small for some users

customer_reviews.title: I seldom review items but this simple little product has ...
customer_reviews.text: I seldom review items but this simple little product has helped me so much I feel compelled let others know about it. I have suffered from neck and shoulder pain for many years. Doctors have told me this is due to degeneration of disc and joints in my neck. I tried everything and nothing worked until I tried this thing. I use it one or two times a day and it almost completely relieves my pain and stiffness. I can even go up to about a week with out using it before the pain begins to return. I have no financial interest in this product but wanted to let others know what it has done for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne B

customer_reviews.title: This one is not bad, but I prefer the 4 level versions better
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several of these inflatable cervical traction devices. This one is not bad, but I prefer the 4 level versions better. This one gets too hard before it gets tall enough to give me good traction. This makes it uncomfortable and less effective when compared to the 4 layer units.
customer_reviews.author: see es es

customer_reviews.title: A godsend!
customer_reviews.text: I know my picture looks rediculous but this thing has reduced my neck pain by at least 50%. I've reduced my pain meds and increased my range of motion.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A.

customer_reviews.title: Hoped for better
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do anything for my neck, but that's an individual thing. I take issue with the design and quality. I find attaching the Velcro straps to be harder than it should be. The patches that the straps attach to are very small. They could have easily been made larger. After about 20 uses, I can't get it to pump up to where I want it because it leaks air out as fast as I can pump it in. Cheap construction.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie G

customer_reviews.title: I don't like sitting and using it
customer_reviews.text: This has been very helpful. I have a pinched nerve in my neck and this has given me relief when it has gotten severe. I am a big guy and this fits well enough on me. It can seem a bit tight but I don't think would be as helpful if it wasn't. I don't like sitting and using it. I get a better result laying down.
customer_reviews.author: Sh2me

customer_reviews.title: It works and is nicely done - Great Customer Service too
customer_reviews.text: The device is nicely designed with quality materials that are comfortable. It does relieve pain by relieving pressure much like regular traction would. I stopped short of a full 5 stars because the velcro straps are a little short for optimum comfort around my neck (which takes an "18" collar size). A question to the company about this was quickly and personally responded to by email. They suggested some interim ideas to maximize comfort and stressed their no-questions-asked return policy if I wish to do that. A very impressive response from them. I have decided to keep the device. Don't hesitate to buy this device if your neck is a bit smaller than mine.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product, Good Results
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have inflated it til it is nice and plump without any leaks (to date -- it's only been a week). I have received some relief for neck arthritis. If you are comfortable wearing it up to 30 minutes, it does offer a nice stretch. I don't imagine it provides the same traction as a floor unit that requires laying down, but for the price it's not bad. If you need something to give moderate relief, it's worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Tom G

customer_reviews.title: Not a substitute for the professional CNT devices
customer_reviews.text: This device does work as described, but it is not as effective as the Saunders device that my therapist used on me, and recommended. The Saunders cost about $300, so I decided to give this a try. I could feel some lift, but it was nothing like what I was used to with the Saunders device. It may be effective if you have mild problems. I had pronounced neck pain and stiffness, and now after 2 months of therapy I am almost pain free, and on home therapy program with stretching exercises and the Saunders device.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from daily neck pain and was really looking forward to using this product for some relief. They only thing I found was a new way to strangle myself. The product is very easy to use, it just doesn't do anything it claims to do. I followed the instructions carefully. As I inflated the device the only thing I felt was it getting tighter around my neck. I tried adjusting it several times, and had the same result each time. It didn't relieve any pressure or stretch my neck as I was hoping. Perhaps it would work on someone with a more narrow neck, but as for me; it didn't help. Item was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie S

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit larger necks
customer_reviews.text: This does not fit large necks as the straps that velcro on are too short. It just chokes you when inflating. Don’t buy if you have a larger neck.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: I love how you can adjust the traction by adding air
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for at least a year now and it has done wonders for my neck pain. I love how you can adjust the traction by adding air, and that a twist of a knob will release the air quickly. I usually sit in a chair when I have this on, but I have put a pillow under my head and laid down and was just a comfortable (although the view of the ceiling isn't as nice as reading a book or watching tv...lol). I always have instant relief as soon as I use it, and it helps with my neck alignment too.
customer_reviews.author: AbAz

customer_reviews.title: This works wonders for a sore neck and shoulders...
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these from a different company. I used it all the time and it corrected some neck problems I have. But eventually it wore out and I didn't get another one for a while. I started having neck problems again and bought this product. It was more expensive, but better made and didn't leak like the first one. I love it. I urge others with neck problems to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila P.

customer_reviews.title: No thank you
customer_reviews.text: This thing does not help! In fact, the awkward pressure it places on your shoulders actually causes more pain. I was desperate for some relief from symptoms related to a pinched nerve in my neck, but ended up returning this because it seemed to make things worse. Instead, I purchased one of the kinds that you loop around the door handle, and then it holds your head/neck in a hammock like sling, while you lay on the floor and slide away from the door to increase tension. That design accomplishes the desired decompression, without applying any undesired pressure to your lower neck/shoulders. I would recommend you save the time/pain and get that kind instead of this.
customer_reviews.author: AJ in AZ

customer_reviews.title: This has given my husband excellent relief with his neck pain
customer_reviews.text: This has given my husband excellent relief with his neck pain. He said after the first time he noticed a difference. We ended up having to buy a second one since our dogs ate the 1st one!! Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leonard & Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Good traction. I've used it for about a week ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time & does seem to help relieve the pain in my neck. Good traction. I've used it for about a week now., starting with 20 minutes once a day and now use in the morning and before bed. Has seemed to make a difference. I'm hoping with continued use my bulging C6 & C7 will completely stop pinching the nerve. After several days of use,I can turn my head which is a big improvement . I suppose it all depemds on what your condition is but for me I am very happy I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Roehl

customer_reviews.title: It's great.  Pump module non-removeable/glued.  can be modded.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is your can't remove the pump module to make it easy to sleep with at low pressure. I'm going to modified the pump to be removable. I like the 3 ring configuration on this one. Gives great support to the back of the head when laying down with it.
customer_reviews.author: Wallynova

customer_reviews.title: Help for hands
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor recommended this because my hands were falling asleep (I don't have carpal tunnel). I have used it for three days and my hands are no longer falling asleep when I work at the computer. I got this particular one because it had better reviews than some less expensive ones but it seems worth it so far.
customer_reviews.author: smey

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars-if you are suffering from neck pain you need to buy this. The relief it creates is bliss!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I was a bit skeptical that this product would work and give me similar pain relief to the contraption the physical therapists use. I was pleasantly surprised! This works so well. It’s so soft, well made and VERY reasonable. I can control the amount of air that inflates it so I can adjust the air to the perfect amount that lifts my neck and instantly relieves the pressure and pain I’ve endured for years. The only regret I have is that I didn’t buy it sooner. I’m going to buy several and give them as gifts to friends & family who also suffer from neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: this really works
customer_reviews.text: I have degenerative disc disease and right now it is affecting C5-C6 and I have physical therapy orders that include neck traction but, because of COVID-19 there is a waiting list and until I can get to PT I thought what the heck I will try this traction Item to see if it will work. I have been using is for 20 minutes a day for 3 days now and I have gotten relief.....I am glad I took the chance, product has helped relieve pressure on my neck which radiates down both arms. Happy with purchase and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony Kalb

customer_reviews.title: Too small for me
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my neck. I have a 16 &1/2 inch neck. The product would pinch my neck when I would use it. It left marks on the neck and shoulder whenever I used it. I can only use the product for about 5 minutes at a time before the pressure on my neck would hurt. The rest of the product was fine, it just was too small for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Mski

customer_reviews.title: Iffers some fibro neck spasm relief
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic neck spasms from fibromyalgia and activity. I love this simple device so much, I have one at home and at work. My husband even notice he felt more relaxed after using it. Great for when your neck needs a little stretch but you can do it yourself. It also helps some when I feel a muscle spasm related migraine coming on. I use it in conjunction with other supports like magnesium spray and my Back Buddy etc to lessen the severity of migraines or to try to prevent the onset of one.
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Gand

customer_reviews.title: I like it but...
customer_reviews.text: I am a pretty big guy and my neck size is 18". The device is too small for me as the Velcro are not long enough to catch and hold the collar in place. I am trying to figure out a way to overcome that shortcoming as I like the concept for stretching my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Moss

customer_reviews.title: Works well, comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to use. So much easier than those cumbersome over-the-door traction devices. Easy to inflate and deflate and pretty comfortable. I like how easy it is to adjust it. I find that after the initial stretch, I have to inflate it a bit more once my muscles have relaxed a bit...and that is so easy to do! (One of the best functions!) It had strong “plastic” smell when I first started using it, but it’s slowly wearing off. Other than that, I’m really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: BCherry27

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous in my honest opinion
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help with neck injuries from Bjj training. What a surprise.... I honestly think it’s dangerous. Maybe because I have a thick neck I get this issue. Tried it twice now and before it’s fully pumped up it cuts off circulation to brain. I know the feeling from getting hit with a blood choke very well. This will do it. My main thing is if someone goes out with this on it could literally kill them. Both times I cranked it up I started to see black around the outlines of my vision. That means release pressure immediately because you have about 4-5 more seconds before your done.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Martin

customer_reviews.title: Needs more work
customer_reviews.text: Didnt seem to help my neck problems. I think more baffles and a more rich is neck strap wound allow better vertical extension because this unit starts to constrict my breathing when I start to feel the actual lifting and decompression of my neck vertibrae. I think one size dose not work for all neck size people.
customer_reviews.author: Ultimate one

customer_reviews.title: Amazon really makes it easy.
customer_reviews.text: I want to give 5 stars, but my neck device came without the valve screw. It couldn't hold any air. This thing only has 4 or 5 pieces. Honestly, I don't get it. Maybe the factory inspector feels he doesn't have to look. The product seems well made. I returned this one and ordered another one. As most all buyers from the Amazon website say.....Amazon really makes it easy.
customer_reviews.author: pizzaman

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who has herniated disk in his neck. He has found relief with the "Cervical Neck Traction Device". It does seem to loose air slowly, but at this point he refuse to give it up. He says it is the most help he has gotten in years for his neck pain. He has only used it about a week. Will update review after he has used it for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Quick Neck and Upper Back Relief
customer_reviews.text: Recently I visited my daughter in FL and she had a Cervical Neck Traction Device and she told me about it. I tried it and it really worked ... I felt so good after about 20 minutes of use. I went online and ordered me one so that it would be there when I arrived back home in VA. The best way to describe it - buy it and try it for yourself. It's a good investment for quick neck and upper back relief.
customer_reviews.author: Bob J. Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: GREAT help with cervical & thoracic pain due to Ankylosing Spondylitis!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace my inflatable cervical traction collar and I'm very happy with this one. I have Ankylosing Spondylitis which compounds the 2 failed cervical spine surgeries I've had in the last 8 yrs. There are many times where I just cannot hold up my own head. (if you're familiar w/AS you'll understand). If anyone out there needs a cervical neck traction device, I HIGHLY recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Schuster

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat undecided
customer_reviews.text: Velcro straps too long to tighten up on a skinny neck. Sewed them shorter. Chin still went through velcro area at front. Tried cutting a piece of 1/2 inch floor tile foam as a stop ring. Probably as good as any of these things. Did not choke me at all. Does not leak like the other one I ordered. Does stretch, but the velcro can only take so much. Nasty on neck beard...
customer_reviews.author: Flatblackard

customer_reviews.title: Economical relief from neck pain
customer_reviews.text: Though it is slightly smaller than the Previous “Body Line” brand unit I have had for the past 10years, itt seems to work fairly well. The main difference I notice is that it does not push down on shoulders the way the body line did, but for the money, since this is a fraction of the price, that is not significant. Overall, so far, it helps a lot, and that makes it totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorilou208

customer_reviews.title: Good product with Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought Cervical Neck Traction Device few months back and it really helped me with my pain. But I was disappointed when the locking release valve broke suddenly and I was not able to inflate the device anymore. I complained about it and to my surprise, they delivered the new one the other day. I am very happy with their service and I hope the valve will last longer this time. The product is definitely very effective for my spasm and I totally love it.
customer_reviews.author: apeksha

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for a year and it's held up well. It works as I expected the product to work so I gave it 4 stars. It gives my neck a good stretch. However, it didn't target my specific neck pain (upper right side). The head hammock works for me and feels more like traction than a stretch. But I'm keeping it and I'm glad I tried it.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate.
customer_reviews.text: Getting it around the neck in the first place is a bit uncomfortable and when using, it is much too tight on the neck without giving the appropriate traction. Even had someone else with a smaller neck try it and it also did not feel good to them.
customer_reviews.author: XanyaeTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied so far with this product and would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: this was just what I was looking for ,I have had one fusion done on my neck years ago, now another surgery pending. this device gives relief and buys me time while I get a second opinion on my current condition. very satisfied so far with this product and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: wes warren

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Will not hold air and is definitely old and used
customer_reviews.author: Niss

customer_reviews.title: Really helps to eliminate neck and shoulder pain!
customer_reviews.text: My Chiropractor recommended this to me. I felt relief after the first use. It really does help in stretching your neck. I drive in a car 8 hours a day for work. I gave lots of tension in my neck and shoulders. I see a chiropractor 3-4x a week. This has helped me to extend visits to just 2-3x per week. Very helpful and the fact that I can do it 3-4x a day in my home or in my car (not whole driving of course) is an even bigger perk.
customer_reviews.author: Parentaling Productions

customer_reviews.title: A lot cheaper than going to physical therapy,  and just as effective.
customer_reviews.text: Real happy with this. Helped a lot with neck, shoulder an arm pain caused by a pinched nerve. Used it once a day for about a week, and haven't needed it again for several months now.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Calaman

customer_reviews.title: Best product for neck pain
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item and used it twice. I already have noticed a significant difference. I have horrible arthritis in my neck and trying to improve my posture along with it. This device is able to help me stretch my neck out and help aid the pain and it is definitely cheaper than going to the chiropractor all the time! I highly recommend for anyone in the same boat as I am!
customer_reviews.author: Kortney

customer_reviews.title: Works, but leaked after just a few uses
customer_reviews.text: First, the concept is great. Even in the few uses I got from this device, it definitely made a difference in my neck. I went from having recurring neck pain to none. Considering the low price, I was very happy. However, after a few uses in my office, just pumping it up while wearing as directed, it started leaking. At first the leak was slow, but it got worse until the product no longer work at all. So, if you think your issue can be fixed with one or two uses, it's worth buying. Otherwise, get a more durable brand. I am going to try another brand myself.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory W. Leatherman

customer_reviews.title: Not for large necks
customer_reviews.text: My neck is 17 1/2" and this does not come close to fitting all the way around. The velcro barely reaches and comes apart easily. This is pretty much worthless for me
customer_reviews.author: Krautmann

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable pain reliever
customer_reviews.text: I have cervical compression and an inverted S-curve recently seen on my chiropractor's X-rays. In lieu of spending $1,000's on medical cervical decompression treatment, I've opted to try this traction device instead. So far, I've been using this almost every day for the past 2 weeks and it's relieved much pain in my neck. It's so comfortable, I want to wear it a couple times a day. I am trying to get in the habit of wearing it when I watch TV because that's when I slouch back on the couch with my head pushed forward on pillows, which is the worst thing I can do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not grea
customer_reviews.text: Product was recommended by our doctor to help with neck extension - somewhat like traction. But the inflatable parts are only in one size. Would be more practical if the product could be used with more exact measurements since everyone’s necks are not the same it can be very uncomfortable and not conducive for relief from pain.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Palmer-Bynum

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief without medication
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to the Cervical Neck Traction Device by EverRelief by my physical therapist. I had injured my neck while gardening. Muscle relaxers prescribed by my physician and several sessions of therapy were producing desired results but slowly. At the second to last PT session I was introduced to the traction device and ordered it a week later. I am using it twice a day. It is easy to use and my pain has diminished to an occasional zero, but is quite tolerable the rest of the time. I continue to do the prescribed exercises as well.
customer_reviews.author: cindy18

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product it was helping with my pain and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product it was helping with my pain and it stopped inflating so not worth the price of the product and no way to contact the seller for help... product didn't last long and broke poor value.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Kieran

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed,  didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought one in Oct 2018. Then it would not inflate. I probably used it twice a week. It helped so much I bought a 2nd one. In a week it broke also. I checked all the connections. The part where it screws closed has air leaking out so it won't inflate. Same problem as the first. It can still be used, I took off the bulb and blow it up with my mouth and lock the tube
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: Works great and holds pressure
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cheaper competitor model first which had a valve leak with no hose clamp. Sent it back to get this one. The valve doesn't leak, but if it did, the hose clamp would work to keep from having to keep pumping it up. Very satisfied and works great to decompress my vertebrae during short periods of time after major neck surgery ."
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lea

customer_reviews.title: What a great and easy to use traction device
customer_reviews.text: What a great and easy to use traction device! I purchased it due to a pinched nerve in my shoulder blade area related to the neck. And guess what? This took care of the issue and I'm pain free. Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This product is priceless. I have a problem with a nerve in my neck. It is especially painful when I try to play the piano. Looking down at the keyboard for more than a few minutes is very difficult. This device allows me to play for as long as I want without pain (although I do feel silly wearing a suede life preserver around my neck.) The customer service is extraordinary. These folks believe in their product. They read your comments and they get in touch with you if you have any reservations or problems with the device. This is rare. I cannot recommend them highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne E. Stark

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a life saver. Relieves my neck and back pain/pressure in just 20 min. Easy to inflate and set up. Put on a good tv show and you don’t even know you have it on. Just don’t over inflate as I have noticed it can restrict your breathing.
customer_reviews.author: TRISHA ORABUENA

customer_reviews.title: bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad who has suffered from chronic neck and back pain. he's tried everything in the world that he's seen come out to ease the pain. He's been using this a couple days now and said it feels really nice, and alleviates some pressure. of course it's only been a few days so relief doesn't last, but hopefully with time it will become a lasting effect. If not, I know when he uses it, it gives a little time with relief. If you suffer from chronic pain even a couple moments mean a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Great for cervical spine pain and pinched nerves
customer_reviews.text: This product works great if you have cervical spine issues and pinched nerves in your neck, etc. I had a c6/7 herniated disc and used this traction device to get relief. It works well and is very easy to inflate using the hand pump. After 10 minutes, I noticed immediate relief.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality and size.
customer_reviews.text: Low quality, and it was too small for my normal sized neck. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: J Foster

customer_reviews.title: This is my third one...
customer_reviews.text: It has a problem with the bulb degenerating and breaking off, but the results are undeniable. I had C4-C7 fusions in three surgeries, and this collar is my go to for the cramps and pain. That's why this is my third purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dr.mae

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: This is like a vacation for your neck!! I was skeptical at first about this product, but it is amazing! All tension and pain is instantly gone immediately after you put it on and inflate it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Does not function as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: If you're throat is bigger than a small child this will most likely just cut your circulation off. The velcro straps are too short. When inflating the device doesn't spread your neck, it will just slide up your face. I have tried repeatedly to get some relief from disc problems and pinched nerves in my neck and this product does not help with that at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Kind of chokes you and traps the blood in your ...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of chokes you and traps the blood in your head but also give you a little releif until you pass out.
customer_reviews.author: K. Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Great product !!!
customer_reviews.text: I had level 4 (C3-C7) cervical spine fusion. When adjusted properly this item does help in decompressing my c- spine. I would recommend to anyone for stretching and pain relief in the neck area. For the people that say it “chokes them” they obviously don’t have the sense to adjust it accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Minimal help, depends on the person
customer_reviews.text: I have some issues with my neck after an injury in high school football. I was hoping this would help on those days where I feel tightness in my neck. This does help, but minimally. I would try it immediately after you buy it to see if it works for you. If it doesn't the first few times, it likely won't ever.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Elbers

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied with this device
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this device. It helps extend my time between visits to the chiropractor and helps my headaches. "This was recommended by my chiropractor. It has helped me with compaction in my neck. I like not having to sit in one spot and having control of the stretch. It works well for,me. "
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Craun

customer_reviews.title: Its head and shoulders better.
customer_reviews.text: I have neck problems and my chiropractor recommend this and it does seem to help stretch my neck. Has saved me several trips to the chiropractor.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not give me any traction. Had to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Beegeese

customer_reviews.title: Velco weak, other wise does fine.
customer_reviews.text: Cons - The Velcro is weak and slips away as the pillow is inflated to moderate tightness. Wish there was a better mechanism on that. The idea of traction itself is good. The back portion must have been a little more taller than the front to get the most of the stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: I'm a larger guy (6'3") so my neck is bigger than the average person and this device doesn't quite fit comfortably. It did offer some relief to my reoccurring neck issues but it's comfortable enough to wear for very long. It is very easy to use and conveniently stores in a closet. it's definitely not a "one size fits all" product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 uses and leaked
customer_reviews.text: What more to say? After 3 uses it leaked and I was beyond the return period.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Really seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this very long, but have been using it daily, it is easy to use, and really does seem to be helping. I have to say I'm surprised!! Thank you for this product, and I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ibought

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few times while recovering from herniated discs. It is akward at first but in seconds comfortable. Easy to use. I used it while watching tv which was nice because I didn't think about what I was doing. I didn't feel like I had to make special time in my day to take it out and use it. Easy to put on while watching tv.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: This was too uncomfortable to use as after first time ...
customer_reviews.text: This was too uncomfortable to use as after first time, my neck hurt on one side. I stopped using but iinstructions does state that it takes a few times before you do not have pain.
customer_reviews.author: Merbear

customer_reviews.title: It appears to work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have had numbness in my entire left arm for a couple of months. After several weeks, I finally called my chiropractor and paid several visits (which is unusual since I'm normally done in about three or four). He suggested that I purchase your product and use it for short periods of time in between my visits. I'm pleased to report that the numbing sensation is nearly gone.
customer_reviews.author: Top Beancounter, but lousy golfer

customer_reviews.title: I just received this device a few days ago in ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this device a few days ago in hopes that I'd get some relief from severe shoulder pain caused by tendinitis. I've been wearing it for a few half-hour periods at a time and have noticed a reduction in the pain level. As I build up the frequency of wearing it I'm hoping it will continue to improve the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki O

customer_reviews.title: Might work fine for women
customer_reviews.text: Might work fine for women, but my neck is larger and the Velcro won't hold. Take forever to pump up.
customer_reviews.author: John Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, convenient, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking at one of these, you're likely in desperate need of one like I was. It has helped me tremendously. Great purchase. Would buy again if needed
customer_reviews.author: K. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I get tension headaches often so I purchased this. When I feel a headache coming on, I put this on and inflate it. I wear it around the house for about 10 minutes and it helps relieve the pressure on my neck. I'm very happy that I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has lived with chronic neck pain most of my life, I was glad to discover this product. I have tried several remedies over the years and this seems to be working well. I sit at a desk 10 hours a day minimum and I have been using this several times a day for relief. I look foward to realizing the long terms results. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I usually go to the chiropractor every 2 to 3 weeks I’ve been using this device for over a month now and I haven’t been to the chiropractor. Works great , I wish I had bought something like this year’s ago. would’ve save me a lot of money going to a chiropractor .
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: first day i got it i couldn't wait to use it. It honestly puts the right amount of pressure on my neck and lifts it to do just what its made for. If i get used to this one. Im sure ill be buying the one with 4 instead of 3 for more Traction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing  and the price is right  and it's simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a lady with dystonia and her neck has been a real problem. After using the ever relief neck collar for 3 days now it is remarkable to see the results. The pain has become at least acceptable which is all we could probably ask for.. I will keep you informed as time goes on but for the time being thank you for it's been a blessing. I intend to get myself 1 as of today for I have problems with my neck as well. It's very well put together and I was really glad to see that it was FDA approved.
customer_reviews.author: ROBOW

customer_reviews.title: little tight for big folks
customer_reviews.text: Is a little tight for bigger folks... I have a 19.5" neck.... But with a little positioning, it does help... My C 4,5,6 & 7 are thinning and putting pressure on my spinal cord... this seems to help some... epidural steroids also help... between the 2, I have avoided fusion or disc replacement... worth the money thus far....
customer_reviews.author: Doug Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Be careful over-doing it
customer_reviews.text: I over-pumped it a couple times, and it gave me a headache. It works ok otherwise, but if you truly need something like this, I'd recommend that machine that flips your entire body upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Willis Chung

customer_reviews.title: Worth the try.
customer_reviews.text: I had a huge pain in my neck. I went to two different doctors. I didn't want to get hooked on Pain meds. The nurse told me about this device. I am so glad I tried it. After about two weeks with wearing it about an hour each night, I have no pain in the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the product don’t get me wrong I just thought ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the product don’t get me wrong I just thought it would be a higher lift in the front but other than that a great product
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful to sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful to sleep. I've problem sometimes in my column and this product help me to have a pleasurable night
customer_reviews.author: BRomano

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as hoped
customer_reviews.text: Bought for wife with neck issues, this doesnt seem to give much relief. I will go with a traction kit next time. I tried myself and it gets nice and tight when inflated, but doesnt really take pressure off the neck, just pushes against everything shoulders to head.
customer_reviews.author: Ben King

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to, great quality, perfect for tightness/pain relief, pretty comfortable as long as you don't inflate too much or wear too long, definitely helps to stretch neck and correct posture. It does take a bit to inflate and you can't really move your head once it's on and inflated but I think that's the point.
customer_reviews.author: Bere Tallman

customer_reviews.title: A great neck pain reliever
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these at the chiropractor and he recommended that I buy one! So I bought this one and love it! Most of my stress goes to my neck and shoulders and this gives me great pain relief just by stretching out the muscles!!! Highly Recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Glenna Zolyak

customer_reviews.title: Pure Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Pure Garbage, should have returned it, but missed the window. It Leaks and takes forever to fill, then does not stretch your neck properly.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B

customer_reviews.title: Needs some improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Throat area is uncomfortable, and actully hurt Needs something for comfort, and velcro comes loose when device pumped up to a comfortable level.
customer_reviews.author: William Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: With the EverRelief Cervical Neck Traction Device I get great relief to my neck and the relief even goes ...
customer_reviews.text: With the EverRelief Cervical Neck Traction Device I get great relief to my neck and the relief even goes 1/3 of the way down my spine. I highly recommend for your neck pains.
customer_reviews.author: Christy L

customer_reviews.title: Wearing it every day
customer_reviews.text: I use it every evening after work. My neck hurts so bad after work but this and an Aleve does the trick. Thank you for a wonderful product. I rescheduled a Chiro appt and used this and it really helped.
customer_reviews.author: Junellen

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, I asked my chiropractor about how often and how it should be used(he's the one that recommended I give it a try). He said don't Stretch too much, because the muscles will tighten up in reaction and actually do more harm than good, just a little to relieve pressure in the neck and shoulder area-stretch can be built up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: recommended by provider
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to relieve tension and pain in my neck. when i showed to my therapist she stated this would be a good purchase and I could adjust the tension. this is works well for my husband and myself.
customer_reviews.author: L D

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: i cant get it on my neck i am a big guy and this thing seems to be made for small people only i cannot attach the velcro straps
customer_reviews.author: farmer Dan

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: A life saver. And a money saver. Physical Therapists hold out until the last couple of sessions before they pull out the traction device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to inflte
customer_reviews.text: Once pumped up I think it feels pretty good. However, it takes a long time to pump and with arthritic hands it is very tiring and makes hand pretty sore.
customer_reviews.author: aggie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Provides much needed relief for a man with a really messed up neck from a brick in the head and being rear ended 9 different times (yes, you heard that right)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A Davis

customer_reviews.title: Daily use is beneficial.
customer_reviews.text: This traction device is easy to use and can be used multiple times a day. Provides a nice stretch and my spine appreciates it!
customer_reviews.author: JamesAshley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and not bulky at all
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and not bulky at all. The product worked better than expected - helps stretch the neck gently and always under your control. Lightweight and easy to bring when travelling. C5 & C6 spinal bones were previously injured and this product helped relieve some of the pain and pressure between therapy sessions and even after long drives over bumpy roads.
customer_reviews.author: ethelope

customer_reviews.title: Has really helped relieve pain from bulging discs in my neck
customer_reviews.text: This has been such a help in continuing to recover after a car accident. Works well, easy to use. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: "My husband seems to be getting relief from neck pain!! It’s worth everything to me to see him feel better!!! "
customer_reviews.author: laurieo58

customer_reviews.title: Instant relief
customer_reviews.text: I have so much neck and shoulder pain. I know it stems from holding my kids and working at a computer all day. I felt the stretch and traction immediately when I started using this. I use it twice a day for 20 minutes and have felt such a difference in my neck and some relief in my shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: alissa spears

product_meta.title: Cervical Neck Traction Device by EverRelief - Inflatable & Adjustable Neck Stretcher Collar - at Home Traction for Neck Pain Relief
feature_bullets: ✅ BOOST YOUR PRODUCTIVITY & PERFORMANCE: Feel more energized with the EverRelief premium cervical neck traction device. Relieve headaches and muscle stiffness while improving your sense of wellbeing.
✅ ALLEVIATE NECK PAIN & DISCOMFORT: Our comfortable neck decompression traction device for home therapy may help relieve pinched nerves, soreness, cervical neck spasms, herniated discs and tension.
✅ ADJUST IT TO YOUR NEEDS: The inflatable design will allow you to find your sweet spot and enjoy 100% personalized neck pain relief. Plus, it fits most neck sizes up to 17.5 inches.

✅ NECK PAIN RELIEF ON-THE-GO: Unlike impractical door neck hammocks or complex home traction devices for neck pain relief, our lightweight neck extender is super-easy to carry and use anywhere you are.
✅ GET YOUR NECK TRACTION DEVICE 100% RISK-FREE: If you are not 100% thrilled with your neck inflatable traction device, we will offer you a full refund on-the-spot! That's our pain-relief guarantee!
